casebody.data:
DUNBARTON POINT AT GREYSONTE VILLAGE CONDOMINIUM OWNERS ASS'N, INC.
v.
PARLIAMENT POINTE HOME-OWNERS ASS'N, INC. No. CO106-330. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed September 4, 2007. Certification Date September 24, 2007. Appeal from Wake (05CVD7102).

Case reported without published opinion Reversed and remanded.
